heading: Growing Dreams, One Seed at a Time
paragraph1: Hi! I'm Danielle, and I believe that anyone can create their own green paradise, no matter how small the space. My journey started with a few recycled containers and a handful of seeds, and it blossomed into a thriving urban garden.
paragraph2: Through Plant a Seed, I want to share the joy and fulfillment that comes from nurturing plants from their very beginning. Whether you're growing flowers that brighten your day or vegetables that nourish your family, every seed planted is a step toward a greener future.

featureCards.title: Orchid Collection
featureCards.description: These delicate beauties are a testament to patience and care. Orchids may seem challenging, but with the right approach, they reward you with stunning blooms.

featureCards.title: Tropical Treasures
featureCards.description: Hibiscus flowers bring a touch of the tropics to any garden. Their vibrant colors and unique petals make every bloom a celebration.

contactSubtitle: Have questions or want to share your gardening journey? We'd love to hear from you!
